summary: Family Law Attorney, Author, Speaker, Legal Innovator, Entrepreneur. Billie Tarascio is the owner of Modern Law and it's sister company Access Legal. She has embraced the newest trends, tech, and information to create a next generation law firm that was recently named as one of the fastest growing firms in the nation. Billie has created a DIY software that, when coupled with a law firm, can maximize success for litigants and minimize the cost they spend on attorneys. Attorneys should spend their time in court, analyzing case law, and negotiating on behalf of clients, not drafting preliminary paperwork. Billie is the author of the amazon best selling, "Decode Your Divorce." Billie is a frequent speaker and presenter on issues related to legal technology, practice management, law firm development and family law. She is also a wife and mother of four!
name: Billie Tarascio
title: Arizona Family Law Attorney
